issues.title: scripts/lib/dispatch.sh is not a functional dispatch library (stunir_dispatch undefined; log_info undefined)
scripts/lib/receipt.sh generates unrelated env-key JSON; does not emit stunir.receipt.build.v1 receipts required by verifier
scripts/build.sh pipeline diverges from tools/verify_build.py contract (paths, targets, and receipts)
Provenance reproducibility contract: verify_build.py rebuilds provenance from spec/ + asm/, but build.sh uses different roots/epoch
Strict verify requires receipts/ir_manifest.json to match asm/ir/*.dcbor set; build.sh writes an empty stub
Native/compiled route is not the primary execution path (dispatch forces shell receipt; build_docker uses Python tools)
